name: stock-ticker-app
description: Connects to the Alpha Vantage REST API and searches query endpoints based on user's search inputs, then display the data or a user friendly message if data was not found based on user search query.

scripts.test: concurrently "mkdir -p src src/js src/css src/scss src/assets" "touch src/index.html src/js/index.js src/scss/styles.scss"

author: Jahmali Mcknight
